title: Ring Pop Colorfest Individually Wrapped Holiday Blue Raspberry Party Pack ‚Äì 30 Count Blue Raspberry Flavored Candy Lollipop Suckers - Festive Blue Stocking Stuffer & Candy Gifts For The Holiday Season
description: Ring Pop Colorfest Blue Raspberry is the ultimate iconic wearable lollipop hard candy with an eye-catching blue candy gem that is deliciously playful. This hard blue raspberry candy gem and matching blue ring are adored by kids and adults which makes it perfect for sharing with family and friends at holiday parties, blue-themed parties, holiday gatherings, kids‚Äô birthday parties, bachelorette parties, weddings, and almost any special occasion. Kids will enjoy wearing their festive blue candy gem Ring Pop and matching color ring with friends during the holidays because hangouts are way more fun with Ring Pop! Add these blue lollipops as stocking stuffers for sweet Christmas fun! Vibrantly colorful and unique, Ring Pop Colorfest Blue Raspberry candy adds a level of fun to any hangout, no matter where it may be. Each blue raspberry lollipop variety bag includes 30 individually-wrapped blue Ring Pop gem candy lollipops in a classic mouthwatering raspberry flavor that kids [and adults] love! So, what are you waiting for? Unwrap the fun, create a blue holiday-themed candy bar, and enjoy the delicious blue raspberry candy gem lollipops at your next holiday gathering. The perfect Holiday treats to hand out to friends and family at your next holiday gathering because hangouts are way more fun with the Ring Pop Colorfest Blue Raspberry party pack. There are enough festive blue lollipop rings to go around and share the fun together! Ring Pop Colorfest festive blue candy lollipops are great treats for parents to share from the variety of blue flashy gems as blue party favors, candy gifts, holiday candy bags, prizes, or snacks for everyone to enjoy--they‚Äôre ideal for sharing! Brighten up your next holiday hangout and bring a bag of these delicious blue raspberry candy treats to share with friends and family. Ring Pop is great holiday candy, adds some pizzazz to your Ugly Christmas Sweater outfit, and is perfect to use as stocking stuffers. Our blue raspberry candy mix is shelf-stable, long-lasting, and great for kids. Disclaimer: Not for children 3 and under.

reviews.name: Frequent  Customer
reviews.reviewTitle: A big hit with the kids!
reviews.review: Bought a bag of 30 blue ones via  Prime for my son‚Äôs birthday party in late October. The 4th grade boys at the party were happy to have them included in the goody bags. Had about 15 leftover I put in a separate candy bowl for Halloween trick-or-treaters and the small kids who got them were SO excited they shouted out to other kids on the street ‚ÄúThey have ring pops!‚Äù And then we got mobbed by the mostly preschool crowd. I will buy more for next Halloween again to keep in a separate bowl from our regular candy and the other bowl of non-edible treats (little party favor toys I get on Amazon or at the party store‚Äîthose are great too because they don‚Äôt go bad, so I pack up the leftovers in a big ziploc and have them ready for next Halloween).

title: Ring Pop Individually Wrapped Bulk 20 Count Lollipop Variety Christmas Holiday Party Pack ‚Äî Lollipop Suckers w/ Assorted Flavors - Fun Candy for Holiday Parties and Stocking Stuffers
description: Ring Pop is the ultimate iconic wearable lollipop hard candy to hand out this holiday season, with an enormous eye-catching candy gem that's so deliciously playful, the fun never ends! Deliciously festive, this hard candy is adored by kids and adults alike, making it ideal for sharing with family and friends during the holidays! These shelf-stable treats can also add a fun twist to holiday celebrations! Vibrantly colorful and unique, Ring Pops add an extra level of fun to holiday parties and are the perfect lollipop snack to stuff Christmas stockings with. These shelf-stable candies are great for any kid's holiday candy bags! Ring Pop bulk variety packs are the ultimate candy for holiday parties, with a wide assortment of fruity flavors loved by adults and kids alike! They also make deliciously fun individually wrapped fillers for a holiday party favor candy bag, and make great holiday decorations! Celebrate Christmas, Hanukkah, Kwanza, or New Year's with Ring Pop, because these lollipop assortments are great for any kid's holiday candy bags and make great stocking stuffers or candy gifts. So, what are you waiting for? Brighten up your next big holiday party with this iconic holiday sucker. Each lollipop variety bag includes 20 individually-wrapped Ring Pop gem candy lollipops in a selection of 5 assorted flavors, with everyone's classic mouthwatering favorites - Strawberry, Blue Raspberry, Cherry, Watermelon, and Twisted Berry Blast. Unwrap the fun at your next Christmas party, and share in the jolly fun with your favorite flavor from this 20-count variety pack! Ring Pop candy lollipops make an excellent gift candy, ideal for sharing with friends and other Christmas party-goers! Keep them in your pantry for a tasty snack, or a delicious holiday candy treat. Bring a bag to your Christmas party or gathering! Our holiday candy mix is shelf-stable and long-lasting. Disclaimer: Not for children 3 and under.

reviews.name: ForeverYOUNG
reviews.review:
I am a huge tootsie roll fan and that is bulk of what is in this mix, but I also love Dots and mini sugar daddy suckers - which were a surprise because I didn't see the mini sugar daddies in the photo on the ad. Everything else is... well... 'ok.' A lot of Charm suckers (with bubble gum in the center) - YUCK. I toss those.
But to each his own! Maybe you like them! All are fresh enough and tasty. I rarely buy these, but love the small sizes = less guilt. The bag arrived in great shape along with other stuff I had ordered. I never hesitate to update my reviews should new info seem useful.

title: Ring Pop Hard Candy Pops, Variety Pack, 44 Count
description: With over 40 years of history, Ring Pops remain a pop culture icon that every generation loves. These tangy, sweet gemstones atop a plastic, expandable ring fit nearly any finger, with a handy disc to keep dribbles away from your fingers. This item remains a top-ranked candy offering and has a proven track record as a top seller. It's ideal for all occasions including convenience stores, concessions, vending machines, offices, parties and pantries. Features 44 individually wrapped Ring Pops in each jar, including new Ring Pop Sours.
